description: An illustration of five matryoshka dolls, also known as nesting dolls displayed in a cluster. The largest doll is in the back: it is blonde with a light red head covering and a dark purple dress. In front of the largest doll to the right is the second largest doll, black-haired with a blue head covering and red dress with yellow trim. In front of the largest doll to the left is the third largest doll: it only has a discernible mouth, is brunette with a light pink head covering and yellow dress with red trim. The fourth largest doll is front of the second largest and has no discernible face, is red-headed, and has a deep brown head covering and blue dress with pink trim. The fifth largest doll (or the smallest doll) is in front of the third largest; it also has no discernible face, blue hair, a very pale pink head covering, and a deep brown dress eith blue trim.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
